name: AT&T SERVICES INC AND ITS AFFILIATES
sampleDescriptions:
Legislative and regulatory initiatives related to limiting the use of pre-dispute arbitration in consumer contracts and issues related to litigation reform, including:
H.R.1374/S.537 - Arbitration Fairness Act of 2017 (provisions related to limiting the use of pre-dispute arbitration in consumer contracts).

General issues concerning copyright, patent and trademark reform, including the following bill:
H.R.1695 - Register of Copyrights Selection and Accountability Act of 2017 (issues concerning reorganization of the Office of the Register of Copyrights).

General lobbying on issues impacting corporate taxation, including the following specific bills:

H.R. 1725/S. 765 - Digital Goods and Services Tax Fairness Act of 2019 (provisions related to implementation of the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, including potential regulations related to GILTI); and

S. 604 - Mobile Workforce State Income Tax Act of 2019.

General lobbying on issues impacting corporate taxation, including the following specific bills:

S. 604 - Mobile Workforce State Income Tax Act of 2019 (all provisions);

S.617 - Tax Extender and Disaster Relief Act of 2019 and H.R.3301 - Tax Payer Certainty and Disaster Tax Relief Act of 2019 (provisions related to section 181 of the tax code); and

S. 765 /H.R. 1725 - Digital Goods and Services Tax Fairness Act of 2019 (provisions related to implementation of the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, including potential regulations related to GILTI); and 

S.803/H.R.1869 - Restoring Investment in Improvements Act (restoring the 15 year depreciation recovery period for Qualified Improvement Property (all provisions).

General lobbying on issues impacting corporate taxation, employer provided benefits and taxation of international data.

Lobbying on the following specific bills:

S. 604 - Mobile Workforce State Income Tax Act of 2019 (all provisions);

S.617 - Tax Extender and Disaster Relief Act of 2019 and H.R.3301 - Tax Payer Certainty and Disaster Tax Relief Act of 2019 (provisions related to section 181 of the tax code); and

S. 765 /H.R. 1725 - Digital Goods and Services Tax Fairness Act of 2019 (all provisions); and 

S.803/H.R.1869 - Restoring Investment in Improvements Act (restoring the 15 year depreciation recovery period for Qualified Improvement Property (all provisions).
General lobbying in issues related to intellectual property rights enforcement.
